summary: Studded Imperial Armor can now be improved on the workbench
descriptionHtml:
I made this cause I really don\'t understand why that armor can\'t be improved, I really like that armor. Well, now it can, you just need some leather and you can temper it like normal armor.

Install: Extract the plugin from the archive and place it in your data folder. If you download this through NMM just activate it in your \"Mods\" tab.

Uninstall: Just do the opposite.

I hope you like it.
author: Werne
